page.title: 06LEISURE IN BROMLEY CROSS
page.content: People have more time and money to enjoy leisure pursuits.There are lots of places in Bromley Cross to carry out these pastimes,such as Eagley Sports Complex with a wide ranging variety of sports facilities available e.g. Squash,Cricket,Keep Fit,Tennis. There are many local fishing lodges; public footpaths and wide open spaces for everybody's pleasure. Children and parents and many retired people use the local parks for their enjoyment,playing bowls or just passing the time of day,and the children use the facilities available to them e.g. swings,slides and roundabouts.There are lots of public houses where people are served drinks and meals can be obtained. Take away meals are very popular especially bangers.
